info.title: EventCity API and Documentation
info.description:
### EventCity API provides resources for consuming the users, centers and events endpoints
- EventCity API can be used to programatically create and manage event centers. You will be able to:
- Signup and Signin.
- Create, edit and delete centers as and Admin.
- Create, edit and delete events.
- Cancel event as an Admin.
- Update an events.
- View bookings information and centers information.
 - Reschedule cancelled event

get.summary: Gets all events for a center

parameters.name: centerId
parameters.description: Center's id to get all events

200.description: Server's response when a center is found

data.name: St Kizitos Place
data.facilities: Chairs, Air Conditions, Stages, Rest rooms

events.name: Sauce Code meeting
events.note: This is a meetup to teach young girls how to code
